Home » 13S4 Saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta » 1.4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 1.4.2 Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
1.4.2.59 Bāhirāyatanadukkhasutta
Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
Bāhirāyatanadukkhasutta
226.
918“Rūpā, bhikkhave, dukkhā. Saddā…  gandhā…  rasā…  phoṭṭhabbā…  dhammā dukkhā. Evaṃ passaṃ…pe…  nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
<< 1.4.2.58 Bāhirāyatanaaniccasuttaup1.4.2.60 Bāhirāyatanaanattasutta >>
